Name: Disguises Unlock
Description:
Buy Sea of Thieves Disguises Unlock and acquire any desired Disguise Chest without any grind! If you have some of the Commendations completed, you don't have to overpay for them: just choose what Commendation you've already done and get the chest for cheaper.
You will get:
The chosen Disguise Chest unlocked;
Necessary Commendations completed;
Gold, Renown, PvP Exp, and Doubloons may be acquired during the service.
With SoT Disguise Chests farming, ambush your enemies when they don't expect it, thanks to your new disguises!
There are the following Disguises available: Treasure Chest Disguise, Coral Marauder’s Chest Disguise, King’s Chest Disguise, Sea Master’s Chest Disguise, Stronghold Chest Disguise, Chest of the Damned Disguise, Chest of Legends Disguise, Chest of Fortune Disguise.
